argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srgsummulcr.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | srgsummulcr.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | srgsummulcr.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | srgsummulcr.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 5 |  | srgsummulcr.r | |- ( ph -> R e. SRing ) |
| 6 |  | srgsummulcr.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 7 |  | srgsummulcr.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 8 |  | srgsummulcr.x | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) |
| 9 |  | srgsummulcr.n | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) finSupp .0. ) |
| 10 |  | #P_srgcmn | |- ( R e. SRing -> R e. CMnd ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> R e. CMnd ) |
| 12 |  | #P_srgmnd | |- ( R e. SRing -> R e. Mnd ) |
| 13 | 5, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> R e. Mnd ) |
| 14 | 1, 4 | #P_srgrmhm | |- ( ( R e. SRing /\ Y e. B ) -> ( x e. B |-> ( x .x. Y ) ) e. ( R MndHom R ) ) |
| 15 | 5, 7, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> ( x .x. Y ) ) e. ( R MndHom R ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( x = X -> ( x .x. Y ) = ( X .x. Y ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( x = ( R gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) -> ( x .x. Y ) = ( ( R gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) .x. Y ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 11, 13, 6, 15, 8, 9, 16, 17 | #P_gsummhm2 | |- ( ph -> ( R gsum ( k e. A |-> ( X .x. Y ) ) ) = ( ( R gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) .x. Y ) ) |
